verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> [T'al-and; יְדִיתוּן ye-di-tun כיְדוּת֗וּן <WH3038> ye-du-Tun, Jeduthun קלְאָסָ֥ף <WH623> le-'a-Saf of Asaph מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <WH4210> miz-Mor. A Psalm קוֹלִ֣י <WH6963> ko-Li with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him unto God וְאֶצְעָ֑קָה <WH6817> ve-'etz-'A-kah; I cried קוֹלִ֥י <WH6963> ko-Li with my voice אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, [even] unto God וְהַאֲזִ֥ין <WH238> ve-ha-'a-Zin and he gave ear אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> 'e-Lai. in

בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom In the day צָרָתִי֮ <WH6869> tza-ra-Ti of my trouble אֲדֹנָ֪י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord דָּ֫רָ֥שְׁתִּי <WH1875> da-Ra-she-ti I sought יָדִ֤י׀ <WH3027> ya-Di my sore לַ֣יְלָה <WH3915> Lay-lah in the night נִ֭גְּרָה <WH5064> Nig-ge-rah ran וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo without תָפ֑וּג <WH6313> ta-Fug; and ceased מֵאֲנָ֖ה <WH3985> me-'a-Nah refused הִנָּחֵ֣ם <WH5162> hin-na-Chem to be comforted נַפְשִֽׁי׃ <WH5315> naf-Shi. not my soul

אֶזְכְּרָ֣ה <WH2142> 'ez-ke-Rah I remembered אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God וְאֶֽהֱמָיָ֑ה <WH1993> ve-'e-he-ma-Yah; and was troubled אָשִׂ֓יחָה׀ <WH7878> 'a-Si-chah I complained וְתִתְעַטֵּ֖ף <WH5848> ve-tit-'at-Tef was overwhelmed רוּחִ֣י <WH7307> ru-Chi and my spirit סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

אָ֭חַזְתָּ <WH270> 'A-chaz-ta Thou holdest שְׁמֻר֣וֹת <WH8109> she-mu-Rot waking עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> 'ei-Nai; mine eyes נִ֝פְעַ֗מְתִּי <WH6470> nif-'Am-ti, I am so troubled וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo cannot אֲדַבֵּֽר׃ <WH1696> 'a-dab-Ber. that I cannot speak

חִשַּׁ֣בְתִּי <WH2803> chish-Shav-ti I have considered יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> ya-Mim the days מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> mik-Ke-dem; of old שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <WH8141> Not, the years עוֹלָמִֽים׃ <WH5769> o-la-Mim. of ancient times

אֶֽזְכְּרָ֥ה <WH2142> 'ez-ke-Rah I call to remembrance נְגִינָתִ֗י <WH5058> ne-gi-na-Ti, my song בַּ֫לָּ֥יְלָה <WH3915> bal-La-ye-lah in the night עִם־ <WH5973> 'im- with לְבָבִ֥י <WH3824> le-va-Vi with mine own heart אָשִׂ֑יחָה <WH7878> 'a-Si-chah; I commune וַיְחַפֵּ֥שׂ <WH2664> vay-chap-Pes made diligent search רוּחִֽי׃ <WH7307> ru-Chi. and my spirit

הַֽ֭לְעוֹלָמִים <WH5769> Hal-'o-la-mim alway יִזְנַ֥ח׀ <WH2186> yiz-Nach cast off אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai; Will the Lord וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- not יֹסִ֖יף <WH3254> yo-Sif add לִרְצ֣וֹת <WH7521> lir-Tzot he be favourable עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> od. again

הֶאָפֵ֣ס <WH656> he-'a-Fes clean gone לָנֶ֣צַח <WH5331> la-Ne-tzach alway חַסְדּ֑וֹ <WH2617> chas-Do; Is his mercy גָּ֥מַר <WH1584> Ga-mar fail אֹ֝֗מֶר <WH562> 'O-mer, promise לְדֹ֣ר <WH1755> le-Dor age וָדֹֽר׃ <WH1755> va-Dor. age

הֲשָׁכַ֣ח <WH7911> ha-sha-Chach forgotten חַנּ֣וֹת <WH2589> chan-Not to be gracious אֵ֑ל <WH410> 'El; Hath God אִם־ <WH518> 'im- Or קָפַ֥ץ <WH7092> ka-Fatz shut up בְּ֝אַ֗ף <WH639> be-'Af, ;hath he in anger רַחֲמָ֥יו <WH7356> ra-cha-Mav tender love סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

וָ֭אֹמַר <WH559> Va-'o-mar And I said חַלּ֣וֹתִי <WH2470> chal-Lo-ti This [is] my infirmity הִ֑יא <WH1931> Hi; I שְׁ֝נ֗וֹת <WH8141> Not, [but I will remember] the years יְמִ֣ין <WH3225> ye-Min of the right hand עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. of the most High

אַזְכִּיר 'az-kir כאֶזְכֹּ֥ור <WH2142> 'ez-Kor shall remember קמַֽעַלְלֵי־ <WH4611> ma-'al-lei- the works יָ֑הּ <WH3050> Yah; of the LORD כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- Surely אֶזְכְּרָ֖ה <WH2142> 'ez-ke-Rah surely I will remember מִקֶּ֣דֶם <WH6924> mik-Ke-dem of old פִּלְאֶֽךָ׃ <WH6382> pil-'E-cha. thy wonders

וְהָגִ֥יתִי <WH1897> ve-ha-Gi-ti I will meditate בְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol- all פָּעֳלֶ֑ךָ <WH6467> po-'o-Le-cha; also of all thy work וּֽבַעֲלִ֖ילוֹתֶ֣יךָ <WH5949> u-va-'a-Li-lo-Tei-cha of thy doings אָשִֽׂיחָה׃ <WH7878> 'a-Si-chah. and talk

אֱ֭לֹהִים <WH430> E-lo-Him O God בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> bak-Ko-desh [is] in the sanctuary דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <WH1870> dar-Ke-cha; Thy way מִי־ <WH4310> mi- What אֵ֥ל <WH410> 'el a God גָּ֝ד֗וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol, who [is so] great כֵּֽאלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> Ke-lo-Him. God

אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah You הָ֭אֵל <WH410> Ha-'el Thou [art] the God עֹ֣שֵׂה <WH6213> 'O-seh that doest פֶ֑לֶא <WH6382> Fe-le; wonders הוֹדַ֖עְתָּ <WH3045> ho-Da'-ta thou hast declared בָעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> va-'am-Mim among the people עֻזֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5797> 'uz-Ze-cha. thy strength

גָּאַ֣לְתָּ <WH1350> ga-'Al-ta redeemed בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> biz-Ro-a' Thou hast with [thine] arm עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha; thy people בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the sons יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob וְיוֹסֵ֣ף <WH3130> ve-yo-Sef and Joseph סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

רָ֘א֤וּךָ <WH7200> ra-'U-cha saw מַּ֨יִם׀ <WH4325> Ma-yim The waters אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> 'elo-Him, thee O God רָא֣וּךָ <WH7200> ra-'U-cha saw מַּ֣יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim the waters יָחִ֑ילוּ <WH2342> ya-Chi-lu; thee they were afraid אַ֝֗ף <WH637> 'Af, also יִרְגְּז֥וּ <WH7264> yir-ge-Zu also were troubled תְהֹמֽוֹת׃ <WH8415> te-ho-Mot. the depths

זֹ֤רְמוּ <WH2229> Zo-re-mu poured out מַ֨יִם׀ <WH4325> Ma-yim water עָב֗וֹת <WH5645> a-Vot, The clouds ק֭וֹל <WH6963> Kol a sound נָתְנ֣וּ <WH5414> na-te-Nu sent out שְׁחָקִ֑ים <WH7834> she-cha-Kim; the skies אַף־ <WH637> 'af- yet חֲ֝צָצֶ֗יךָ <WH2687> cha-tza-Tzei-cha, thine arrows יִתְהַלָּֽכוּ׃ <WH1980> yit-hal-La-chu. also went abroad

ק֤וֹל <WH6963> Kol The voice רַעַמְךָ֨׀ <WH7482> ra-'am-Cha of thy thunder בַּגַּלְגַּ֗ל <WH1534> bag-gal-Gal, [was] in the heaven הֵאִ֣ירוּ <WH215> he-'I-ru lightened בְרָקִ֣ים <WH1300> ve-ra-Kim the lightnings תֵּבֵ֑ל <WH8398> te-Vel; the world רָגְזָ֖ה <WH7264> ra-ge-Zah trembled וַתִּרְעַ֣שׁ <WH7493> vat-tir-'Ash and shook הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. the earth

בַּיָּ֤ם <WH3220> bai-Yam [is] in the sea דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <WH1870> dar-Ke-cha, Thy way; וּשְׁבִילֶיךָ u-she-vi-lei-cha כוּֽ֭שְׁבִֽילְךָ <WH7635> U-she-vi-le-cha path קבְּמַ֣יִם <WH4325> be-Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> rab-Bim; in the great וְ֝עִקְּבוֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH6119> ve-'ik-ke-vo-Tei-cha, and thy footsteps לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not נֹדָֽעוּ׃ <WH3045> no-Da-'u. are not known

נָחִ֣יתָ <WH5148> na-Chi-ta Thou leddest כַצֹּ֣אן <WH6629> chatz-Tzon like a flock עַמֶּ֑ךָ <WH5971> 'am-Me-cha; thy people בְּֽיַד־ <WH3027> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh of Moses וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> ve-'a-ha-Ron. and Aaron
